name: I spent ten years in the looking glass and when I returned home I found my kingdom in ruins
name_original: I spent ten years in the looking glass and when I returned home I found my kingdom in ruins
description:
I spent ten years in the looking glass and when I returned home I found my kingdom in ruins is a game developed by NathanZutt. It was originally released in 2022.
You can play I spent ten years in the looking glass and when I returned home I found my kingdom in ruins on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
